verses.roman:
āra eka praśna kari, śuna, tumi māmā
yathārtha kahibe, chale nā vañchibe āmā'

synonyms: āra eka—one more; praśna—inquiry; kari—am putting; śuna—hear; tumi—you; māmā—maternal uncle; yathā-artha—as it is true; kahibe—you should speak; chale—by tricks; na vañchibe—you should not cheat; āmā'-Me.
translation: "My dear maternal uncle, I wish to ask you another question. Please tell Me the truth. Do not try to cheat Me with tricks.
